articles.title: Minnesota Twins vs. Houston Astros Prediction, Preview, and Odds - 5-29-2023 - Winners and Whiners
articles.description: The Houston Astros will be going for their second consecutive win over the Minnesota Twins when they play the first game of their three-game series on Monday afternoon. Which one of these teams will get the win? Continue reading to find out.
articles.content:
